reviewText:
Very helpful in understanding the essential unity underlying all world religions and what it means to
"Be Still and Know that I am God" and Love the Lord Thy God with all thy heart, all thy mind, all thy strength, and all thy Soul
Concepts found in religious beliefs of Western and Eastern scriptures
Outstanding film.  The speaker shared deep wisdom on Spirituality,.  namely that the same universal truths are in all the great religions.

This is an inspiring video that helps us see that we all are God's children, no matter which religion or spiritual path we are on. Brother Anadamoy is a very interesting speaker and exudes the feeling of love for and from God.
Beautiful wisdom explained clearly.  Brother Anandamoy dives deep into scripture and brings out the inner meaning with clarity, wisdom and humor.
